data_handling.write_topology_to_file module¶

data_handling.write_topology_to_file.write_topology_to_file(location: str, topology: numpy.ndarray, snapshot_num: int)[source]¶

Writes a given snapshot’s topology (list of ISLs) to file in correct format for integration with Hypatia software.

Parameters

  • location – name of .npy file that contains ISl pairs describing a topology

  • topology – adjacency matrix format of topology produced by algorithm

  • snapshot_num – the number of snapshots of the network over one orbit for which a topology is constructed

LEO_Satellite_Network_Topology_Design
